9 namespace vistle {
10 
11 template<class T>
12 class shm_ref {
13 
14  public:
15  shm_ref()
16  //: m_name(Shm::the().createArrayId())
17  : m_name("")
18  //, m_p(shm<T>::construct(m_name)(Shm::the().allocator()))
19  , m_p(nullptr)
20  {
21  ref();
22  }
23 
24  shm_ref(const std::string &name, T *p)
25  : m_name(name)
26  , m_p(p)
27  {
28  ref();
29  }
30 
31  shm_ref(const shm_ref &other)
32  : m_name(other.m_name)
33  , m_p(other.m_p)
34  {
35  ref();
36  }
37 
38  shm_ref(const shm_name_t name)
39  : m_name(name)
40  , m_p(shm<T>::find(name))
41  {
42  ref();
43  }
44 
45  ~shm_ref() {
46  unref();
47  }
48 
49  template<typename... Args>
50  static shm_ref create(const Args&... args) {
51  shm_ref result;
52  result.construct(args...);
53  return result;
54  }
55 
56  bool find() {
57  assert(!m_name.empty());
58  if (!m_p) {
59  m_p = shm<T>::find(m_name);
60  ref();
61  }
62  return valid();
63  }
64 
65  template<typename... Args>
66  void construct(const Args&... args)
67  {
68  unref();
69  if (m_name.empty())
70  m_name = Shm::the().createArrayId();
71  assert(!m_name.empty());
72  m_p = shm<T>::construct(m_name)(args..., Shm::the().allocator());
73  ref();
74  }
75 
76  const shm_ref &operator=(const shm_ref &rhs) {
77  unref();
78  m_name = rhs.m_name;
79  m_p = rhs.m_p;
80  ref();
81  return *this;
82  }
83 
84  bool valid() const {
85  return !!m_p;
86  }
87 
88  operator bool() const {
89  return valid();
90  }
91 
92  T &operator*();
93  const T &operator*() const;
94 
95  T *operator->();
96  const T *operator->() const;
97 
98  const shm_name_t &name() const;
99 
100  private:
101  shm_name_t m_name;
102 #ifdef NO_SHMEM
103  T *m_p;
104 #else
105  boost::interprocess::offset_ptr<T> m_p;
106 #endif
107  void ref() {
108  if (m_p) {
109  assert(!m_name.empty());
110  assert(m_p->refcount() >= 0);
111  m_p->ref();
112  }
113  }
114 
115  void unref() {
116  if (m_p) {
117  assert(!m_name.empty());
118  assert(m_p->refcount() > 0);
119  if (m_p->unref() == 0) {
120  shm<T>::destroy(m_name);
121  m_p = nullptr;
122  }
123  }
124  }
125

129  void save(Archive &ar) const;
130  template<class Archive>
131  void load(Archive &ar);
132 };

134 #define V_DECLARE_SHMREF(T) \
135  extern template class V_COREEXPORT shm_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>; \
136  extern template void V_COREEXPORT shm_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::load<vistle::yas_iarchive>(vistle::yas_iarchive &ar); \
137  extern template void V_COREEXPORT shm_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::load<vistle::boost_iarchive>(vistle::boost_iarchive &ar); \
138  extern template void V_COREEXPORT shm_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::save<vistle::yas_oarchive>(vistle::yas_oarchive &ar) const; \
139  extern template void V_COREEXPORT shm_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::save<vistle::boost_oarchive>(vistle::boost_oarchive &ar) const;
140 
141 #define V_DEFINE_SHMREF(T) \
142  template class shm_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>; \
143  template void shm_ref<shm_array<T, typename shm<T>::allocator>>::load<vistle::yas_iarchive>(vistle::yas_iarchive &ar); \
